title: 15 Easy and Delicious Cinco de Mayo Desserts
description: Get recipes and inspiration for easy Cinco de Mayo desserts, from fun margarita cupcakes to traditional Mexican tres leches cake and flan.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 15 Easy Cinco de Mayo Desserts That Bring the Party By Vanessa Greaves Vanessa Greaves Vanessa Greaves is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes with nearly two decades of experience helping home cooks gain confidence in the kitchen. A self-taught cook who grew up reading cookbooks for fun, Vanessa lives and breathes the challenges faced by busy everyday cooks to get dinner on the table. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on April 25, 2024 Close Credits: AllrecipesPhoto These fun-loving Cinco de Mayo desserts are perfect for any type of gathering. From party-ready cupcakes and dessert nachos to traditional Mexican desserts like tres leches cake and flan, we have loads of sweet Cinco de Mayo dessert ideas that are as delicious as they are easy to make. Let's take a look at some of our best Cinco de Mayo dessert recipes. 01 of 16 Frozen Margarita Pie View Recipe Save Deb C Here's a centerpiece for your Cinco de Mayo dessert table. It's everything you love about margaritas, but 10 times more impressive. And with only three tablespoons of booze flavoring the filling, no one will have to Uber home after one slice too many. 02 of 16 Churros View Recipe Save Laura Y If you're looking for authentic Mexican desserts for Cinco de Mayo, try these churros. They're filling up your Instagram and Pinterest feeds, so why not make this the year you learn how to make churros? 03 of 16 Dessert Nachos View Recipe Save Melissa Goff Here's an idea for a quick and easy Cinco de Mayo dessert: It takes a mere 10 minutes to throw the peanut butter, chocolate chips, marshmallows, coconut, and tortilla chips together before running the pan under the broiler until it's all toasty and bubbly. Dig in! 15 Cinco de Mayo Recipes That'll Own the Potluck 04 of 16 Margarita Balls I View Recipe Save Molly Tequila shots in cookie form? You'll be the talk of the party when you show up with these. But in a good way. Watch this video to see how to make them. 05 of 16 Sopapilla Cheesecake Pie View Recipe Save Melissa Goff This top-rated Mexican-inspired dessert combines the cinnamon and honey flavor of traditional sopapillas, but with tangy, creamy cheesecake encased in crescent roll dough. 06 of 16 Bananas Foster Chimichangas View Recipe Save LYNNINMA Sweet, crunchy tortillas filled with warm, rum-laced bananas. (You know you want some now.) If frying's not in your future, you can serve the boozy bananas over ice cream with baked tortilla wedges smeared with butter and cinnamon sugar. 07 of 16 Original Mexican Flan Napolitano View Recipe Save gem An authentically delicious Mexican flan recipe that calls for both evaporated and condensed milk as well as cream cheese. Since you cool this before serving, it's perfect for making ahead. Watch the Video 08 of 16 Lime and Tequila Infused Strawberries View Recipe Save lutzflcat Serve these tipsy berries with shortcake and whipped cream for a big-kids-only dessert. Prep is super-quick and easy, but be sure to let the berries steep for an hour to let all the juices mingle. What do you mean you can't wait that long? 09 of 16 Cinco de Chili Chocolate Cupcakes with Chili Cream Cheese Frosting View Recipe Save CookinBug Here's a memorable Cinco de Mayo potluck dessert. These cupcakes will make up for that time you broke the thing when you swung at the piñata. Yeah, you remember that. Everyone remembers that. 10 of 16 Margarita Cake with Key Lime Cream Cheese Frosting View Recipe Save camp0433 What gives this dessert its name is the margarita mix in the batter. You can bake it as a layer cake, a Bundt cake, or as cupcakes (as shown); they're all good. Add rum or tequila to the frosting if you want to liquor things up. 11 of 16 Tres Leches Piña Colada Cake View Recipe Save Marilyn Martin Watch the video to see how to make this incredibly moist and coconut-y cake. There's no booze in the recipe, but you could always add a tablespoon to flavor the whipped cream topping, if that's how you like it. Get tips for making light and fluffy whipped cream. 12 of 16 Carlota de Limon (Mexican Lemon Icebox Cake) View Recipe Save Chapita This no-bake icebox cake is a traditional Mexican treat, with layers of citrus cream and cookies. Just four ingredients is all it takes, so you can whip this up in no time! 13 of 16 Capirotada a la Antigua (Mexican Bread Pudding) View Recipe Save Allrecipes Traditionally served around Easter time in Mexico, but a welcome treat anytime, this rich bread pudding will steal the show at your Cinco de Mayo feast. Watch the Video 14 of 16 Spicy Mango-Basil Paletas View Recipe Save Linda T If you like your Popsicles with a bit of a kick, try these sweet and spicy paletas with the addition of cayenne pepper. 15 of 16 Tres Leches Cake View Recipe Save Yucarespo A classic tres leches cake with three different milks soaked up by a deliciously spongy cake. No one will pass up a slice of this! Also try: Vegan Tres Leches Cake Watch the Video 16 of 16 More Inspiration Get more ideas for your Cinco de Mayo feasting with our recipes and collections: Pictured: Birria de Res Tacos Our Top Cinco de Mayo Drinks All Cinco de Mayo Recipes Explore more: Recipes Holidays and Events Recipes Cinco de Mayo Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
